snippet: Maria Grazia Chiuri and Pierpaolo Piccioli recently unveiled a Fifth Avenue flagship by creating a 47-piece couture collection in its honor and bringing the show to Manhattan.
abstract: Maria Grazia Chiuri and Pierpaolo Piccioli recently unveiled a Fifth Avenue flagship by creating a 47-piece couture collection in its honor and bringing the show to Manhattan.

headline.main: Valentino Brings Couture to New York
